name: Hexio - Puzzle Game
description:
Simply drag the same-colored tiles from the belt to make as many hexagons as you can. As you connect tiles in hexagons, they disappear! 

Are you in a mess? Just refresh the belt or rotate the tiles to get more hexes. Discover this really unique gameplay and you will absolutely get stuck to our hexes!

Hexio’s main features:
– 6 Game Modes to discover. Classic, XXL, Blitz, Stars, Gears, Anti. Choose the ideal mode personally for you! 
– Hexio is super user-friendly. We offer night and day modes taking care of your eye health. 
– What’s more, we care about all people. We created a Color Blind mode - now small symbols differing the colors appear on the tiles!
– Play the game without Wi-Fi connection.
– Cool graphics and easy-to-understand gameplay

Show all agility of your brain!
